GameConditionDef.label: mental suppression
GameConditionDef.description: The winds of magic blow strong, weakening the mental state of mortals.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: the winds of magic will blow wildly around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], weakening the mental capacity for all
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The winds of magic have calmed.
GameConditionDef.letterText:
Every colonist feels a wave of laziness and distraction!

The winds of magic have stirred to a great level. They are sweeping the nearby area, altering the mental state of all. For up to a few days, all will be less capable.

Magic users will have the ability to cast all spells without depleting their magic pools.
